definition: keenly felt pain/bitter anguish
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
to cut/to slice/tangent (math)
skin
(possessive particle, literary equivalent of 的[de5])/him/her/it
ache/pain/sorrow/deeply/thoroughly

sentences.english: But only now are Japanese companies starting to feel the real pinch.
sentences.chinese: 不過僅僅是到了日本公司才感到切膚之痛。

sentences.english: He was rather cut up after his wife passed away.
sentences.chinese: 太太身故後，他感到切膚之痛。

definition: foolish talk/nonsense
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
lit. small belly, chicken's gut (idiom); narrow-minded/petty
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world

trivial matter/a piece of cake
